title: Samurai (1988) Vol. 3  issue 001 Barry Blair Aircel Comics
description:
i just finished scanning and editing issue one (only six more issues to go) so I thought I would post and see if anyone is interested. I should have the rest up by the middle of April

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been a year since Hotachi disappeared, following his last clash with the black-ops organization Splinter. During that time, the groupÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s leader, Velvet Black, has managed to establish a state of martial law throughput the City. But it has come at a high cost, for HotachiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s former employers are now allied with their own greatest enemy, Dr. Arkoff. The goal of this unholy union is the creation of a new, invincible army of clones, an immortal master race. So far, the only resistance to SplinterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s takeover has been the rebel Black Dove faction, an underground network of freedom fighters. But without Hotachi, without a champion for their forces, and the citizens, to rally around, Black Dove doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t stand a chance.


Enjoy and seed
